Container.Name: open-playlist
Container.Overview:
Open Playlist - Spotify Waiting List Manager
A lightweight Spotify host application that manages a waiting-list playlist system with search, queue control, and recently played track management.
Features: - Waiting list playlist management with reorder/add/remove - Full playback controls (play/pause, device selection) - Real-time queue updates via long-polling - Search tracks and add to queue - Recently played track history - Mobile-first responsive design - Automatic playlist advancement
Before using: 1. Create Spotify Developer App at https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard 2. Get Client ID and Client Secret 3. Add redirect URI: http://YOUR_UNRAID_IP:5173/callback 4. Configure environment variables below

Config.Name: Storage
Config.Description: Persistent storage for session and queue data

Config.Name: Spotify Client ID
Config.Description: Your Spotify Application Client ID from https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard

Config.Name: Spotify Client Secret
Config.Description: Your Spotify Application Client Secret (keep this secure!)

Config.Name: Spotify Redirect URI
Config.Description: Redirect URI - MUST match what you set in Spotify Developer Dashboard. Replace YOUR_UNRAID_IP with your server's IP address.

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Internal port (should match WebUI port above)

Config.Name: Host PIN
Config.Description: PIN code for host-only actions (connect/disconnect). Change from default for security!

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Server log verbosity: DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR

Config.Name: Session Store Path
Config.Description: Path to session storage file (OAuth tokens)

Config.Name: Queue Store Path
Config.Description: Path to queue storage file (playlist state)
